# easyGDS at ITB Berlin 2026

> Get a free professional booking engine (Flight + Hotel) for your travel agency. Exclusive offer for ITB Berlin 2026 attendees.

## Offer Details
- [Claim Engine](https://itb.easygds.com/): Register for one of the 100 free spots.
- **Value**: $4,800/year (12 months free).
- **Includes**: Branded B2C website, Booking Engine, Global Content, B2B Network tools.
- **Location**: Hall 6.1, Stand 228.

## Main Site
- [easyGDS](https://www.easygds.com): Core platform details and documentation.
